metadata.title: CVE-2022-3109 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the FFmpeg package, where vp3_decode_frame inlibavcodec/vp3.c lacks check of the return value of av_malloc() and willcause a null pointer dereference, impacting availability.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
